class.name: OScriptNodeCoercion
class.deprecated: This node is no longer available.
class.brief_description: Provides an implicit conversion between two Godot types.
class.description: This node provides the Orchestration with an implicit cast between two unique Godot types, such as between [int] and [String]. These nodes are automatically added when connecting two pins that are not compatible but can be coerced (cast to) the target type. [b]Deprecated:[/b] This node is now deprecated and no longer available. An [OScriptNodeTypeCast] node should be used instead to explicitly cast between two types, where needed. [i]This node is scheduled for removal in a future build of Orchestrator.[/i]
